mapper.sql: dict_id, dict_name, sort, remark, type_id, state, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_user_name, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into public.t_sys_dict_info (dict_id, dict_name, sort, remark, type_id, state, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_user_name, modify_date) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update public.t_sys_dict_info
dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update public.t_sys_dict_info set dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select dict_id, dict_name, di.remark, di.type_id, di.create_user_id, dt.type_name, di.create_date, di.sort from t_sys_dict_info di INNER JOIN t_sys_dict_type dt ON di.type_id = dt.type_id where di.state > 0
and dict_name like'%'||#{search.dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and di.type_id = #{search.typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by di.sort

select
from public.t_sys_dict_info where state > 0 and type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by sort
